description: Fresh mango adds a hint of sweetness to this salmon and soba noodle salad. Make this nutritionally approved recipe for a tasty dinner the family will love.
name: Salmon, Mango & Soba Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Asian sesame, soy & ginger dressing
1 Calypso mango, peeled, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. Toast sesame seeds in pan, stirring, for 3 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a small bowl and set aside until ready to use.
Spray same pan with oil and place over medium heat. Cook salmon for 3 minutes on each side or until just cooked through. Transfer to a plate to cool slightly. Roughly flake.

Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions, adding beans for the last minute of cooking. Drain. Refresh under cold water. Drain. Transfer to a large bowl. Add cabbage, carrot, capsicum, dressing and mango, then toss to combine.
Serve salad topped with salmon and sprinkled with sesame seeds.
